hackathon-description-text: MadHacks is the University of Wisconsin's twice-annual hackathon, bringing together partcipants from all over the US for 24 hours of hacking. Unlike other hackathons, MadHacks is going to be putting emphasis on the wacky, the original, and the downright impossible!
hackathon-requirements:
Even if your hack isn't "finished" you should still submit it for judging. 
You will be judged on the following criteria: Creative, Technical, Useful, Polished/Complete, Theme (When applicable)
hackathon-rules: Please be aware that by attending this event, you agree to the MLH Data Sharing Notice:
